comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: An important element in the work of Air Raid Wardens was to hold regular emergency exercises to maintain a heightened sense of readiness among the population. Here are Air Raid Wardens of the Newtown station supervising the moving of injured people on stretchers, September 1940.
